description: These easy truffles are fun to make and take very little effort.
name: White Chocolate & Coconut Truffles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place 300g of white chocolate in a bowl with the butter and cream and microwave in 30 second bursts until melted. Stir in the vanilla. Chill for 2 hours. Use a melon baller to scoop the mix into 30 balls and roll with your hands.
Place the balls on a lined baking tray and chill int he freezer for 30 minutes to harden. Melt the rest of the white chocolate in a large bowl in the microwave in 30 second bursts.

Melt the rest of the white chocolate in a large bowl in the microwave in 30 second bursts. Drop each ball in and coat with chocolate using a fork. Place back on the baking tray and sprinkle liberally with coconut. Repeat until you have coated all of the truffles.
Chill in the fridge until ready to serve.
